## üìñ Laj…õba .

**PyHelper** ye Python baarak…õmin…õnw ye minnu b…õ se ka k…õ f…õn caman ye, minnu dilannen don walasa ka **Data s…õg…õs…õg…õli, …≤…õjirali, jatemin…õ baarak…õcogo, ani nafama baarak…õcogo n…îg…îya**.  
A b…õ don kalanko, …≤inini, ani baarak…õlaw ka poroz…õw la cogo la min t…õ …≤…îg…în ta, o b‚Äôa to i b…õ se ka i sinsin hakilinaw kan sanni ka i sinsin kode boilerplate kan.

Nafa j…înj…înw:
- üßÆ A b…õ don a k…în…î **Jatew ni jateb…î nafama**
- üìä A ka n…îg…în ka baara k…õ ni **Data Visualization Wrappers ye**
- üóÇ Handy **dosiy…õri baarak…õcogo ani …≤inini**
- üîç **Syntax validation** ka …≤…õsin Python filew ma .
- üåç **Kan caman d…õm…õni** ni baarak…õcogo lab…õnnenw ye .
- üöÄ Optimized for **Fast prototyping** ani **kalan kuntilenna**

---

## ‚ú® F…õn minnu b…õ k…õ .

## üìä Data Visualization .
- bar charts horizontales & vertical (`hbar`, `vbar`) .
- Pie charts (`pie`) .
- Box plots (`boxplot`) .
- Histogrammes (`histo`) .
- Heatmaps (`Sheatmap`) .
- Donanw ka tabali (`Taabolo`) .
- Visualizations avanc√©s (scatter, violon, kde, pairplot, wdfl)

## üìà Jatemin…õw .
- C…õmanc…õla ≈ãaniya sumanik…õlanw :  
  `get_media`, `get_median`, `get_moda`
- j…õns…õnni f…õ…õr…õw : .  
  `Get_rank`, `get_var`, `Get_Desv`, `Disp`
- Data normalisation (`Normalize`) .
- Outlier detection (IQR & Z-Score f…õ…õr…õw) .
- Data changements conditionnels (`conditionnel`) .

## üõ† utilities .
- File s…îr…îli ani doni (`weleli`) .
- Enhanced **switch / asyncswitch** syst√®me .
- Sinsinnanw s…õg…õs…õg…õli & s…õg…õs…õg…õli (`Pythonfilechecker`, `check_syntax`)
- filiw lakali ni k…în…îkow ye .
- D…õm…õn sira j…õlen (`d…õm…õ`, …≤…õjiraliw, docs) .

## üåç Kan caman d…õm…õni .
- Bamanankan na, bamanankan na, o ye **12 kanw ye**
- A b…õ se ka janya ni `load_user_translations()` ye.
- Sugandili fangama ni `set_language(lang_code)`
- Fallback default ka Angil…õkan .

---

## üöÄ Installation .

Aw b…õ a sigi ka b…î PYPI la:

```Bash .
Pip installation pyhelper-tools-jbhm .
```

---

## üîß Baarak…õcogo misaliw .

### Set kan .
```Python .
ka b…î d…õm…õbagaw doncogo la set_language .

set_language("en") # Bamanankan
set_language("es") # espa√±ol .
set_language("fr") # faransikan .
set_language("de") # Alema…≤i .
set_language("ru") # Risila .
set_language("tr") # Turkikan .
set_language("zh") # chinois .
set_language("it") # Italien .
set_language("pt") # portuguese .
set_language("sv") # Suw…õdikan .
set_language("ja") # Japonkan
set_language("ar") # Arabukan .
# ... D…õm…õ don kan 100+ ma .
```

### Jatemin…õ j…înj…înw .
```Python .
Aw b…õ d…õm…õ don d…õm…õnan na i n‚Äôa f…î HP .

Donanw = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5].

print(hp.get_media(data)) # k…îr…î ye .
print(hp.get_median(data)) # median .
print(hp.get_moda(data)) # Mode .
```

### Visualization .
```Python .
Aw b…õ d…õm…õ don d…õm…õnan na i n‚Äôa f…î HP .
ka b…î d…õm…õbaga.subModules import graphique as gr .

df = hp.pd.dataframe({"nafaw": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
gr.histo(df, "nafaw", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### File baarak…õcogo .
```Python .
ka b…î d…õm…õbagaw ka donko weleli la .

data = call("my_data", type="CSV") # A b…õ CSV file d…î s…îr…î ani k'a doni a y…õr…õma .
```

### Bamanankan ni d…înko bamanankan na .
```Python .
ka b…î d…õm…õbagaw donli la load_user_translations .

# load ladamu bamanankan na ka b…î lang.json .
load_user_translations("Lafasali/lang.json")
```

---

## üìÇ Poroz…õ sigicogo .

```
D…õm…õbaga/
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py # Baarak…õcogo kunbabaw .
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/ # Bamanankan bamanankan na (JSON) .
 ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Submodules/ .
 ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py # yecogo baarak…õcogo .
 ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py # Jatemin…õ baarak…õcogo .
 ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py # utilit√© d…õm…õbagaw .
 ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py .
```

---

## ü§ù ka d…õm…õ don .

Bolomafaraw b…õ s…în!  
Aw ye kow da wuli, ka f…õ…õr…õw jira, walima ka sama …≤ininiw bila [GitHub Repository] kan(https://github.com/jbhmdev/pyhelper-tools).
